briefTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity of the Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine IC51 (IXIARO®) in a Pediatric Population
officialTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity of the Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine IC51 (IXIARO®) in a Pediatric Population. Open Label, Randomized, Active Controlled, Phase 3 Study
summary: The primary objective is to assess the systemic and local safety profile of purified inactivated Japanese Encephalitis Virus (JEV) vaccine IC51 administered in two doses in a 28 days interval up to Month 7 after the first IC51 vaccination in a pediatric population from endemic regions.

primaryOutcome.measure: Rate of Subjects With Serious Adverse Events and Medically Attended Adverse Events Until Day 56 After First Vaccination

effectByArm.arm: IC51, Subjects Aged >= 2 Months to <1 Year
